trans-unit.source: Update the quickstart client app to capture and upload images
trans-unit.target: Update the quickstart client app to capture and upload images

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, open the Package.appxmanifest file and in the **Capabilities** tab enable the **Webcam** and **Microphone** capabilities.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, open the Package.appxmanifest file and in the **Capabilities** tab enable the **Webcam** and **Microphone** capabilities.

trans-unit.source: This makes sure that your app can use a camera attached to the computer.
trans-unit.target: This makes sure that your app can use a camera attached to the computer.

trans-unit.source: Users will be requested to allow camera access the first time that the app is run.
trans-unit.target: Users will be requested to allow camera access the first time that the app is run.

trans-unit.source: Open the MainPage.xaml file and replace the **StackPanel** element directly after the first **Task** element with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Open the MainPage.xaml file and replace the **StackPanel** element directly after the first **Task** element with the following code:

trans-unit.source: Replace the **StackPanel** element in the **DataTemplate** with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the **StackPanel** element in the **DataTemplate** with the following code:

trans-unit.source: This adds an image to the **ItemTemplate** and sets its binding source as the URI of the uploaded image in the Blob Storage service.
trans-unit.target: This adds an image to the **ItemTemplate** and sets its binding source as the URI of the uploaded image in the Blob Storage service.

trans-unit.source: Open the MainPage.xaml.cs project file and add the following **using** statements:
trans-unit.target: Open the MainPage.xaml.cs project file and add the following **using** statements:

trans-unit.source: In the TodoItem class, add the following properties:
trans-unit.target: In the TodoItem class, add the following properties:

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]To add new properties to the TodoItem object in a JavaScript backend mobile service, you must have Dynamic Schema enabled in your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]To add new properties to the TodoItem object in a JavaScript backend mobile service, you must have Dynamic Schema enabled in your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: When Dynamic Schema is enabled, new columns are automatically added to the TodoItem table that map to these new properties.
trans-unit.target: When Dynamic Schema is enabled, new columns are automatically added to the TodoItem table that map to these new properties.

trans-unit.source: For a .NET backend mobile service, see the topic [How to make data model changes to a .NET backend mobile service](../articles/mobile-services/mobile-services-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-code-first-migrations.md).
trans-unit.target: For a .NET backend mobile service, see the topic [How to make data model changes to a .NET backend mobile service](../articles/mobile-services/mobile-services-dotnet-backend-how-to-use-code-first-migrations.md).

trans-unit.source: In the MainPage class, add the following code:
trans-unit.target: In the MainPage class, add the following code:

trans-unit.source: This code displays the camera UI to capture an image, and saves the image to a storage file.
trans-unit.target: This code displays the camera UI to capture an image, and saves the image to a storage file.

trans-unit.source: Replace the existing `InsertTodoItem` method with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the existing `InsertTodoItem` method with the following code:

trans-unit.source: This code sends a request to the mobile service to insert a new TodoItem, including the image file name.
trans-unit.target: This code sends a request to the mobile service to insert a new TodoItem, including the image file name.

trans-unit.source: The response contains the SAS, which is then used to insert the image in the Blob store, and the URI of the image for data binding.
trans-unit.target: The response contains the SAS, which is then used to insert the image in the Blob store, and the URI of the image for data binding.

trans-unit.source: The final step is to test the app and validate that uploads succeed.
trans-unit.target: The final step is to test the app and validate that uploads succeed.

trans-unit.source: Test uploading the images in your app
trans-unit.target: Test uploading the images in your app

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, press the F5 key to run the app.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, press the F5 key to run the app.

trans-unit.source: Enter text in the textbox under **Insert a TodoItem**, then click **Photo**.
trans-unit.target: Enter text in the textbox under **Insert a TodoItem**, then click **Photo**.

trans-unit.source: This displays the camera capture UI.
trans-unit.target: This displays the camera capture UI.

trans-unit.source: Click the image to take a picture, then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click the image to take a picture, then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Upload** to insert the new item and upload the image.
trans-unit.target: Click **Upload** to insert the new item and upload the image.

trans-unit.source: The new item, along with the uploaded image, is displayed in the list view.
trans-unit.target: The new item, along with the uploaded image, is displayed in the list view.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]The image is downloaded automatically from the Blob Storage service when the imageUri property of the new item is bound to the Image control.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]The image is downloaded automatically from the Blob Storage service when the imageUri property of the new item is bound to the Image control.
